statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); cost=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_cost_usd // 0'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then if git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then git_info=$(printf "\033[33m(\033[32m○\033[33m %s)\033[0m" "$branch"); else git_info=$(printf "\033[33m(\033[31m⚡\033[33m %s)\033[0m" "$branch"); fi; fi; fi; printf "\033[32m%s\033[0m@\033[36m%s\033[0m:\033[35m%s\033[0m" "$user" "$host" "$dir"; [ -n "$git_info" ] && printf " %s" "$git_info"; printf " | \033[34m%s\033[0m" "$model"; [ "$style" != "null" ] && [ -n "$style" ] && printf " | \033[33m%s\033[0m" "$style"; printf " | \033[32m$%.3f\033[0m" "$cost"; echo
